name: Westlake Terrace House
address: 12A, Alley 46 Nguyen Hoang Ton, Tay Ho, Tay Ho District, Hanoi, Vietnam
hotelDesc:
Featuring a terrace, Westlake Terrace House is a holiday home, situated in Tây Hồ. The property is 7 km from Hanoi and free private parking is featured. Free WiFi is provided throughout the property.

There is a dining area and a kitchen complete with a microwave and a fridge. A flat-screen TV with cable channels is available. Other facilities at Westlake Terrace House include a sun terrace.

Noi Bai International Airport is 16 km away.
